mapper.select:
SELECT tdah.stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ , tdah.stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ , tsb.stdt_nm /*stdt_nm 학생_명 varchar(40) */ , teb.loc_nm /*loc_nm 학교_명 varchar(100) */ , tas.act_nm --활동_명 , tdah.act_tcnt_mcnt /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ , tdah.rpet_act_cnt /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ , tdah.cal_csum_qty /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */ , tdah.judg_no /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */ , tbi.tel_no /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , tgb.guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ , tgb.guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */ , tgb.guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ FROM ts_dd_act_hist tdah --일별_활동_이력 tdah inner join TI_ACT_STND tas --활동_기준 TAS on tdah.ACT_CD = tas.ACT_CD inner join TM_STDT_BASE tsb --학생_기본 tsb on tdah.STDT_NO = tsb.STDT_NO inner join TS_BAND_INFO tbi --밴드_정보 tbi on tsb.BAND_ID = tbi.BAND_ID inner join TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN tsgc--학생_보호자_연결 tsgc on tsgc.STDT_NO = tsb.STDT_NO inner join TM_GUAR_BASE tgb --보호자_기본 tgb on tsgc.GUAR_NO = tgb.GUAR_NO left outer join TI_EORG_BASE teb --교육기관_기본 teb on tsb.EORG_LOC_NO = teb.LOC_NO WHERE 1 = 1 /*발생 일시*/ and tdah.stnd_dt between replace(#{stndDtFr},'-','') and replace(#{stndDtTo},'-','') /*학생_번호*/ and tdah.stdt_no = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC /*학생_명*/ and tsb.stdt_NM like CONCAT('%',#{stdtNm},'%') /*활동_분류_코드*/ and tas.act_clss_cd = #{actClssCd} /*활동_코드*/ and tas.act_cd = #{actCd} /*지역_명*/ and teb.LOC_NM like CONCAT('%',#{locNm},'%') /*보호자_번호*/ and tgb.guar_no = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC /*보호자_명*/ and tgb.guar_NM like CONCAT('%',#{guarNm},'%')
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
select tas.act_cd as act_cd /*활동_코드*/ , tas.act_nm as act_nm /*활동_명*/ from ti_act_stnd tas where 1=1 and tas.act_clss_cd = #{actClssCd}
